name: champbb2
description: Champion Base Ball Part-2: Pair Play (set 1)
story:
Champion Baseball II (????????????II), also known as Champion Base Ball Part-2: Pair Play is the sequel to Champion Baseball developed and released by ADK in 1983. It was originally distributed in Japan by SNK, however US distribution was handled by Sega, who in turn passed on responsibilities to Wico.

Champion Baseball II was not ported to home systems and is not thought to have been as successful as its predecessor. A further sequel, Super Champion Baseball, was released in 1989 but Sega was not involved in that release.
